item.title: A Simple Guide to Webscraping With Python
item.description: Webscraping is the process of pulling data from websites, typically using a script. Webscraping is a wonderful thing: like many other automations, you can save hours (or more) of work. I’ve found this skill to be incredible useful, as I’ve applied it to many different projects. In this tutorial, I’ll show you how to write a Python script that creates a CSV file of data from a fake online bookstore. This tutorial assumes that you understand the basics of Python (e.
